title: Create Adaptive Dialog Utility
description: Build a utility class that shows platform-appropriate confirmation dialogs.
instructions: Create an AdaptiveConfirmDialog class with a static show() method. On iOS, it should show a CupertinoAlertDialog. On Android, it should show a Material AlertDialog. The method should accept context, title, message, confirmText, and cancelText parameters, and return a Future<bool?> indicating the user's choice.

hints.text: Use Theme.of(context).platform == TargetPlatform.iOS to detect iOS
Use showCupertinoDialog for iOS and showDialog for Android
Return the boolean value using Navigator.pop(context, value)

commonMistakes.mistake: Using dart:io Platform instead of Theme.of(context).platform
commonMistakes.consequence: Code crashes on web and cannot be tested with platform overrides
commonMistakes.correction: Always use Theme.of(context).platform for widget-level platform detection

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to await the dialog result
commonMistakes.consequence: The method returns null immediately instead of waiting for user input
commonMistakes.correction: The showDialog and showCupertinoDialog calls should be returned directly as they return Future<bool?>
